notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: M.K.H. and D.C. performed an extensive literature search and wrote the majority of the paper; J.S., V.R., D.C. and M.K.H. revised the content of the review, V.R., Z.K. (Zoran Kavrakovski), M.K.H. and Ž.K. (Željko Knez) supervised the writing. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
